title: IBM security advisory (AV25-324)
description: Between June 2 and 8, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: IBM Cloud Pak for Security  versions 1.10.0.0 to 1.10.11.0
IBM Security Verify Governance - Identity Manager Virtual Appliance  version 10.0.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
